<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT &#147;C&#148;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PROVISIONS REGARDING ADDITIONAL RENT AND<br>
ADJUSTMENTS TO FIX RENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 100.55pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Definitions</u>.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.1pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Essential Capital Improvements</u>&#148; shall
mean (a) a labor saving device, energy saving device or other installation,
improvement or replacement which is intended to reduce Operating Expenses,
whether or not voluntary or required by governmental mandate, or (b) an
installation or improvement required by reason of any law, ordinance or
regulation which did not exist on the date of the execution of this Lease, or
(c) an installation or improvement intended to improve the safety of tenants in
the Building generally, whether or not voluntary or required by governmental
mandate.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:54.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Operating Expense Allowance</u>&#148; shall
mean and equal -Tenant&#146;s Proportionate Share of the amount of Operating
Expenses for the calendar year 2000,</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:54.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Operating Expenses</u>&#148; shall mean all of
Landlord&#146;s operating costs and expenses of whatever kind or nature paid or
incurred in the operation and maintenance of the Building and the Land, all
computed on the accrual basis and in accordance with the terms of this Lease,
including, but not limited to, the following:</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:54.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Gas, electricity, steam, fuel, water, sewer
and other utility charges (including surcharge&#146;s) of whatever nature (excluding
use of utilities by other tenants such as may be submetered or separately
metered pursuant to their leases);</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Insurance premiums and the amounts of any
deductibles paid by Landlord;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 90.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Building personnel costs, including, but not
limited to, salaries, wages, fringe benefits, taxes, insurance and other direct
and indirect costs;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Costs of service and maintenance contracts
including, but not limited to, cleaning and security services;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All&#160;
other maintenance&#160; and&#160; repair expenses&#160; (excluding repairs&#160; and&#160;
general maintenance paid by proceeds of insurance or by Tenant or other
third parties, and alterations solely attributable to tenants of the Building
other than Tenant) and the cost of materials and supplies;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any other costs and expenses (i.e. items
which are not capital improvements) incurred by Landlord in operating the
Building, including ground rent, if any;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The cost of any additional&#160; services&#160;
not provided to the&#160; Building on
the Commencement Date but thereafter provided by Landlord in the prudent
management of the Building;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The annual amortization of any Essential of
Capital Improvement which is made by Landlord after completion of initial
construction of the Building, based on the useful life of the improvement plus
interest at the Prime Rate on the date of the expenditure on the
underappreciated portion thereof;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Landlord&#146;s central office accounting costs
and overhead applicable to the Building;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 90.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Accounting fees for preparing the Operating
Expense statement;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 90.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Management fees payable to the managing
agent; and</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 90.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Taxes, allocated on a per diem basis if the
tax year is different than the Operating Year.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Please initial: </font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="18%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:18.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ F.S.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:9.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ D.A.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="52%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:52.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant</font></p>

  <td width="139" style="border:none;"></td>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C-1</font></p>

<div style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='C-1',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Operating
Expenses shall not include:</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 73.45pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Special cleaning or other services, not
offered to all tenants of the Building;</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 91.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any charge for depreciation, interest or
rents (except, if applicable) (ground rents) paid or incurred by Landlord; or</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Leasing commissions.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 91.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Landlord is not furnishing any particular work or service (the cost
of which, if performed by Landlord, would constitute and Operating Expense) to
a tenant who has undertaken to perform such work or service in lieu of
performance by Landlord, Operating Expenses shall nevertheless be deemed to
include the amount Landlord would reasonably have incurred if Landlord has in
fact performed the work or service at its expense.</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .95pt;text-indent:90.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Not withstanding the foregoing, Operating Expenses shall not include
interest and amortization, depreciation, ground rents, expenses for work
performed for other tenants in Building, expenses for repairs or other work
occasioned by fire or other insurable casualty (to the extent covered by
insurance), expenses for leasing or processing new tenants, leasing
commissions, advertising expenses), legal expenses incurred in enforcing the
terms of any tenant leases, salaries for any employees of Landlord above those
attributable the management, operation and maintenance of the Building,
incurred by Landlord in connection with the operation and maintenance of the
Building.</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .95pt;text-indent:89.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">D.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Operating Year</u>&#148; shall mean each
calendar year or such other period of twelve (12) months as hereafter may be
adopted by Landlord as its fiscal year, occurring during the Lease Term.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Taxes</u>&#148; shall mean all taxes,
assessments and governmental charges, whether Federal, state, county or
municipal, and whether general or special, ordinary or extraordinary, foreseen
or unforeseen, imposed upon the Building or the Land or their operation,
whether or not directly paid by Landlord. &#160;Taxes shall not include income taxes, excess
profit taxes, franchise taxes, or other taxes imposed or measured on or by the
income of Landlord from the operation of the Building or the Land; <u>provided</u>,<u>
however</u>, that if, due to a future change in the method of taxation or
assessment, any income, profit, franchise or other tax, however designated,
shall be imposed in substitution, in whole or in part, for (or in lieu of) any
tax, assessment or charge which would otherwise be included within the
definition of Taxes, such other tax shall be deemed to be included with Taxes
as defined herein to the extent of such substitution. &#160;There shall be added to Taxes the expenses of
any contests (administrative or otherwise) of Taxes incurred during the
Operating Year. &#160;Tenant shall pay to the
appropriate governmental authority any use and occupancy tax. &#160;In the event that Landlord is required by law
to collect such tax, Tenant shall pay such use and occupancy tax to Landlord as
Additional Rent upon demand and Landlord shall remit any amounts so paid to
Landlord to the appropriate governmental authority.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<u>Tenants&#146;s Proportionate Share</u>&#148; shall
mean a fraction; the numerator of which shall be the rentable square feet of
Demised Premises, and the denominator of which is 74,200 rentable square feet
which is the aggregate rentable square feet in the Building.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Additional Rent for Operating Expenses</u>.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Commencing on May 1, 2000, Tenant shall pay
during the Lease Term as Additional Rent, the amount by which Tenants&#146;
Proportionate Share of Operating Expenses exceeds the Operating Expense
Allowance.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>As soon as available in each Operating Year
during the Lease Term, Landlord shall provide Tenant with a written statement
setting forth the Operating Expense Allowance and a projection of Tenant&#146;s
Proportionate Share of Operating Expenses for such year commencing on the first
day of the first month following receipt of such statement and continuing until
receipt by Tenant of Landlord&#146;s statement of the next projected Tenant&#146;s
Proportionate Share of Operating Expenses, Tenant shall pay to Landlord with
each monthly installment of Fixed Rent an amount equal to one-twelfth (l/12th)
of the excess of such projected Tenant&#146;s Proportionate Share of Operating
Expenses over the Operating Expense Allowance. &#160;Concurrently with the first payment required
hereinabove, Tenant shall pay to Landlord an amount equal to the excess of such
projected Tenant&#146;s Proportionate Share of Operating Expenses over the Operating
Expense Allowance multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is the
number of calendar months of the Operating Year in question which have elapsed
prior to the due date of such first payment and the denominator of which is
twelve (12), less any payments made by Tenant during said period on account of
such excess Operating Expenses.</p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C-2</font></p>

<div style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='C-2',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Landlord shall, as soon as possible after the
close each such Operating Year, provide Tenant with a statement of the actual
operating expenses for such period. &#160;Any
underpayment by Tenant during such Operating Year due to the fact that
projected Operating Expenses were less than actual Operating Expenses shall be
paid to Landlord within 30 days after Tenant&#146;s receipt of a statement for such
deficiency. &#160;Any overpayment by Tenant
due to the fact that projected Operating Expenses were greater than actual
Operating Expenses for such year shall be credited to the next Additional Rent
payable by Tenant under this Exhibit &#147;C.&#148; If the Operating Expenses are less
than the Operating Expense Allowance, a credit or check will <u>not</u> be
issued.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.4pt;text-indent:72.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Adjustment for Vacancies</u>. &#160;In
determining Operating Expenses for any Operating Year, if the Building was less
than fully occupied during such entire year, or was not in operation during
such entire year, then Operating Expenses shall be adjusted by Landlord to
reflect the amount that such expenses would normally be expected to have been,
in the reasonable opinion of Landlord, had the Building been fully occupied and
operational throughout such year, except that in no event shall such adjustment
result in an amount less than the actual Operating Expenses. &#160;Any such annualization shall be explained in
Landlord&#146;s statement under Section 2.3 hereof.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.45pt;text-indent:36.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Pro-Rations</u>. &#160;Should this Lease commence or
terminate at any time other than the first day of an Operating Year, the
Additional Rent payable by Tenant on account of Operating Expenses shall be
first calculated on the basis of the entire Operating Year and then pro-rated
on the basis of the number of days of occupancy.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.45pt;text-indent:36.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Audit</u>. &#160;Tenant shall have the right at
all reasonable times within thirty (30) days after Landlord has provided Tenant
with a statement of the actual Operating Expenses, and at its sole expense, to
audit Landlord&#146;s books and records relating to this Lease for that Operating
Year.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.45pt;text-indent:36.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Minimums</u>. &#160;Notwithstanding anything
contained herein to the contrary, in no event shall Tenant&#146;s Proportionate
Share of Operating Expenses for any calendar year be less than the Operating
Expense Allowance.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.45pt;text-indent:36.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Personal Property Taxes</u>.&#160;
Tenant will be responsible for ad valorem taxes on its personal property
and on the value of the leasehold improvements in the Demised Premises to the
extent that the same exceed Building Standard allowances (and if the taxing
authorities do not separately assess Tenant&#146;s leasehold improvements, Landlord
may make a reasonable allocation of impositions to such improvements).</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.45pt;text-indent:36.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Survival</u>.&#160; If, upon expiration or
termination of this Lease for any cause, the amount of any Additional Rent due
hereunder has not yet been determined, an appropriate payment from Tenant to
Landlord or refund from Landlord to Tenant, shall be made promptly after such
determination.</p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C-3</font></p>

<div style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='C-3',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT &#147;D&#148;</font></b></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Please Initial: </font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="18%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:18.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:9.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="52%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:52.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">

  <td width="139" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="70" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="146" style="border:none;"></td>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT &#147;E&#148;<br>
RULES AND REGULATIONS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The sidewalks, lobbies, passages, elevators
and stairways shall not be obstructed or used by Tenant for any purpose other
than ingress and egress from and to Tenant&#146;s offices. &#160;Landlord shall in all cases retain the right
to control or prevent access thereto of all persons whose presence, in the
judgement of Landlord, shall be prejudicial to the safety, peace, character or
reputation of the building or of any of the tenants.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The toilet rooms, water closets, sinks,
faucets, plumbing or other service apparatus of any kind shall not be used by
Tenant for any purposes other than those for which they were designed and
installed. &#160;No sweeping, rubbish, rags,
ashes, chemicals or other refuse or injurious substances (which shall include
medical waste) shall be placed therein or used in connection therewith by
Tenant or left by Tenant in the lobbies, passages, elevators or stairways.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Nothing shall be placed by Tenant on the
outside of the building or on its window sills or projections. &#160;Skylights, windows, doors and transoms shall
not be covered or obstructed by Tenant, and no window shades, blinds, curtains,
screens, storm windows, awnings or other materials shall be installed or placed
on any of the windows or in any of the window spaces, except as approved in writing
by Landlord.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>No sign, lettering, insignia, advertisement,
or notices shall be inscribed, painted, installed or placed on any window or in
any window spaces or any other part of the outside or inside of the building,
unless first approved in writing by Landlord. &#160;Names shall be placed on suite entrance doors
for Tenant by Landlord and not otherwise, and at Tenant&#146;s expense. &#160;In all instances the lettering is to be of
design and form approved by Landlord.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Tenant shall not place additional locks upon
any doors and shall surrender all keys for all locks at the end of the tenancy.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Tenant shall not do or commit, or suffer, or
permit to be done or committed, any act or thing whereby, or in consequence
whereof, the rights of other tenants will be obstructed or interfered with, or
other tenants will in any other way be injured or annoyed. &#160;Tenant shall not use nor keep, nor permit to
be used or kept in the building any matter having an offensive odor, nor any
kerosene, gasoline, benzine, fuel, or other explosive or highly flammable
material. &#160;No birds, fish or animals
shall be brought into or kept in or about the premises.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>In order that the premises may be kept in
good state of preservation and cleanliness, Tenant shall, during the
continuance of its possession, permit personnel and contractors approved by
Landlord, and no one else, to clean the premises. &#160;Landlord shall be in no way responsible to
Tenant for the removal, disposal or cleaning of any medical equipment or waste
or for any damage done to furniture or other effects of Tenant or others by any
of Tenant&#146;s employees, or any persons, or for any loss of Tenant&#146;s employees,
or for any loss of property of any kind in or from the premises, however
occurring. &#160;Tenant shall see each day
that the windows are closed, the lights turned out, and doors securely locked
before leaving the premises.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If Tenant desires to introduce signaling,
telegraphic, telephonic, protective alarm or other wires, apparatus or devices,
Landlord shall direct when and how the same are to be placed, and except as so
directed, no installation, boring or cutting shall be permitted. &#160;Landlord shall have the right to prevent and
to cut off the transmission of excessive or dangerous current of electricity or
annoyances into or through the building or premises and to require the changing
of wiring connections or layout at Tenant&#146;s expense, to the extent that
Landlord may deem necessary, and further to require compliance with such
reasonable rules as Lessor may establish relating thereto, and in the event of
non-compliance with the requirements or rules, Landlord shall have the right
immediately to cut wiring or to do what it considers necessary to remove the
danger, annoyance or electrical interference with apparatus in any part of the
building. &#160;All wires installed by Tenant
must be clearly tagged at the distributing boards and junction boxes, and
elsewhere as required by Landlord, with the number of the office to which said
wires lead, and for the purpose for which the wires respectively are used,
together with the name of the concern, if any, operating same.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;text-indent:38.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>No furniture, packages, equipment, supplies
or merchandise of Tenant will be received in the building, or carried up or
down in the elevators or stairways, except during such hours as shall be
designated by Landlord, and Landlord in all cases shall also have the exclusive
right to prescribe the method and manner in which the same shall be brought in
or taken out of the building. &#160;Tenant
shall in all cases have the right to exclude heavy furniture, safes, and other
articles from the building which may be hazardous or to require them</p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Please initial: </font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="18%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:18.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ F.S.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:9.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">/s/ D.A.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="52%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:52.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr height="0">
  <td width="139" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="70" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="146" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="393" style="border:none;"></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E-1</font></p>

<div style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='E-1',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to be located at designated
places in the premises. &#160;The cost of
repairing any damage to the building caused by taking in or out furniture,
safes or any articles or any damage caused while the same be in the premises,
shall be paid by Tenant.</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Without Landlord&#146;s written consent, nothing
shall be fastened to, nor shall holes be drilled or nails or screws driven into
walls of partitions; nor shall walls or partitions be painted, papered, or
otherwise covered or moved in any way, or marked or broken; nor shall any
connection be made to electric wires for running fans or motors or other
apparatus, devices or equipment; nor shall machinery of any kind other than
customary small business machines be allowed on the premises; nor shall Tenant
use any other method of heating, air conditioning or air cooling than that
provided by Landlord. &#160;Telephones,
switchboards and telephone wiring and equipment shall be placed only where
designated by Landlord. &#160;No mechanics,
other than those employed by Landlord, shall be allowed to work in or about the
building without the written consent of Landlord first have been obtained.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:36.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Access may be had by Tenant to the premises
at any time, Access may be refused at Landlord&#146;s election, unless the person
seeking it is known to the watchman in charge, or has a pass issued by
Landlord, or is properly identified to the watchman&#146;s satisfaction.&#160; Landlord shall in no case be responsible for
the admission or exclusion of any person. &#160;In case of invasion, hostile attack,
insurrection, mob violence, riot, bomb threats, explosion fire or any casualty,
Landlord reserves the right to bar or limit access to the building for the
safety of occupants or protection of property.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:36.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Landlord reserves the right to rescind,
suspend or modify any rules or regulations, and to make such other rules or
regulations as, in Landlord&#146;s judgement, may from time to time be needed for
the safety, care, maintenance, operation and cleanliness of the building, or
for the preservation of good order therein. &#160;Tenant agrees to comply with new or modified
regulations of any Federal, State or Municipal authority having appropriate
jurisdiction or any regulatory agencies as they may affect the premises or
building. &#160;Notice of any action by
Landlord referred to in this paragraph, when given to Tenant, shall have the
same force and effect as if originally made a part of the foregoing lease. &#160;But new rules and regulations will not,
however, be unreasonably inconsistent with the proper and rightful enjoyment of
the premises by Tenant under this lease.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:36.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The use of rooms as sleeping quarters is
prohibited at all times.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E-2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='E-2',FILE='C:\JMS\rramali\04-14991-1\task258354\14991-1-km-05.htm',USER='rramalingam',CD='Dec 21 02:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT &#147;F&#148;<br>
SUBORDINATION, ATTORNMENT AND NON-DISTURBANCE AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 42.7pt;text-indent:160.8pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS
AGREEMENT, made as of the&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;day of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
200&nbsp;&nbsp;, by and between
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
a&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;corporation,
having an office at
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(the
&#147;Lender&#148;), and&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
a
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;corporation
having an office at
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(the
&#147;Tenant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 68.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WITNESSETH:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.65pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the
Lender has made a loan (together with any present or future amendments or
increases thereto, the &#147;Loan&#148;) to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(&#147;Landlord&#148;)
evidenced by a Promissory Note of Landlord (together with any present or future
amendments or increases thereto, the &#147;Note&#148;) secured by a mortgage from the
Landlord, as amended, increased, renewed, modified, consolidated, replaced, or
extended being hereinafter referred to as the &#147;Mortgage&#148;, covering all of the
Landlord&#146;s right, title and interest in the land, buildings, improvements and
other items of property described therein, located in Baltimore County,
Maryland and more particularly described in Exhibit &#147;A&#148; annexed hereto and made
a part hereof (said land, buildings, improvements, and such other property
being hereinafter collectively referred to as the &#147;Mortgaged Premises&#148;) and
further secured by an Assignment of Rents and Other Interest (together with any
present or future amendments or increases thereto, the &#147;Assignment Rents&#148;),
both recorded in the Office of the Recorder of Deeds of Baltimore County,
Maryland:</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Landlord and
the Tenant entered into a lease dated as of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
200&nbsp;&nbsp;, (said lease, as the same may be amended, renewed, modified,
consolidated, replaced or extended being hereinafter referred to as the
&#147;Lease&#148;), covering a portion of the Mortgaged Premises (the &#147;Leased Premises&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Assignment of
Rents assigned to Lender all of Landlord&#146;s right, title, interest in and to the
Lease and any other present or future lease of all or any part of the Mortgaged
Premises;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.45pt;text-indent:36.25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Lender, as a
condition to making the loan secured by Mortgage, has required that the Lease
be and continue to be subordinate in every respect to the Mortgage; and</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.7pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the parties hereto
desire to effect the subordination of the lease to the Mortgage and to provide
for the non-disturbance of the Tenant by the Lender;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.2pt;text-indent:36.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW THEREFORE, in
consideration of the premises and the mutual covenants and agreements contained
herein and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and
sufficiency whereof are hereby acknowledged, Tenant and Lender, intending to be
legally bound hereby, covenant and agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .95pt;text-indent:35.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Lease (and all provisions thereof,
including any purchase option) shall at all times be subject and subordinate to
the provisions of this Agreement in each and every respect to the Mortgage (and
all provisions thereof) subject, nevertheless, to the provisions of this
Agreement. &#160;The foregoing provision shall
be self-operative; however, the Tenant, upon request, shall execute and deliver
any certificate which the Landlord or the Lender may request to confirm said
subordination by the Tenant.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:61.45pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Tenant certifies that (a) the Lease is
presently in full force and effect and unmodified, except as noted in this
Agreement, and constitutes the sole agreement between Landlord and Tenant
relating to Tenant&#146;s occupancy of the Leased Premises, (b) to the best of its
knowledge, no event has occurred which constitutes a default under the Lease by
the Landlord or which, with the giving of notice, the passage of time or both,
would constitute a default by the Landlord under the Lease; (c) to the best of
its knowledge, as of the date hereof Tenant has no charge, lien or claim of
offset under the Lease and Landlord does not owe any sums to Tenant under the
Lease or any other agreement. &#160;The full
minimum monthly rental of $&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;is
payable&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
and Tenant has been given no rent concessions or free rent other than as specifically
set forth in the Lease. &#160;The Landlord
shall be a third party beneficiary of the certifications as set forth in this
paragraph.</p>

<p style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="background:white;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Lease and rentals thereunder have been
assigned to Lender as security for repayment of the Loan. &#160;Lender, as such assignee, hereby directs
Tenant to pay to Landlord all rentals and other moneys due and to become due to
Landlord under the Lease until receipt of further direction from Lender.&#160; Upon receipt by Tenant of subsequent
direction from Lender, Tenant shall pay to Lender, or in accordance with such</p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Please Initial: </font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="18%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:18.58%;">

  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:9.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.5%;">

  </td>
  <td width="52%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:52.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="28%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="72%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant</font></p>
  </td>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-1</font></p>

<div style="background:white;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">
